patterns_discovered: Use of Python dataclasses for simple data structures
Clear documentation with docstrings explaining each attribute
Boolean flags for game state tracking (revealed, flagged, mine)
Integer count for adjacent mines (0-8 range)
Default values provided for all attributes
recommendations: Continue using dataclasses for other game model classes if they follow similar structure
Consider adding type hints to method parameters when extending this class
Consider adding validation for adjacent_mines range (0-8) if this will be used in strict contexts
